column1: Smoque BBQ////I moved to the neighborhood three years ago and I've lost count of the number of times I've been here.  Sometimes the line is absurd
column2: sometimes the meat can be a bit dry
column3: and some of the side dishes are forgettable
column4: but I love this place too much for anything less than five stars.  My favorite is the sliced brisket sandwich with sides of fries and coleslaw.  Their fries are secretly awesome
column5: plus the coleslaw is pretty darn good.  My girlfriend swears by the babyback ribs and usually picks them clean.
